section_content: Investing is the process of buying assets that increase in value over time and provide returns in the form of income payments or capital gains. In the world of finance, investing is the purchase of securities, real estate and other items of value in the pursuit of capital gains or income.From : Napoletano, E. (2022, April 4). What is investing? How can you start investing? Forbes Advisor

Risk refers to the possibility of your investments performing below your expectations. Different investments carry different levels of risk.Your risk capacity is how much risk you can afford to take on. It’s based on factors such as your financial situation and how much time you have to invest.
